response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This product, tailored to your specific needs and desires, is priced at $1,200,000. I believe this figure strikes a balance between reflecting its true worth and offering you an exceptional deal. Should you choose to accept this offer, it would not only secure your acquisition of a valuable asset but also pave the way for a potentially long-term relationship based on mutual respect and trust. If you require any further information or have concerns about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 1200000}
